Package app.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AppColors
    Utility class for storing color constants used in the application.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnsiTextParser
    Utility class for parsing ANSI text from C++ native code and applying that styling to Console TextFlow.
    ContextMenuHelper
    Utility class for creating and managing context menus in this JavaFX application.
    DatabaseManager
    Utility class for managing database operations in this application.
    EditorHelper
    Utility class for setting up and managing the behavior of a code editor area.
    FileHelper
    Utility class for handling file operations in the application.
    FontConfig
    Utility class for managing font settings in this JavaFX application.
    FontHelper
    Utility class for managing font settings in this JavaFX application.
    HistoryEntry
    Represents a history entry class in the application.
    SVGHelper
    Utility class for creating SVG icons.
    SVGHelper.SVGIcon
    SVGIcon class for creating SVG icons.
    TextFlowHelper
    Utility class for managing and updating a TextFlow component.
